```{r}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
selectInput(
  "Sleep Quality Scale", 
  label = h3("I have difficulty falling asleep."),
  choices = c(1,2,3,4))
```

```{r}
selectInput(
  "Sleep Quality Scale", 
  label = h3("I fall into a deep sleep."),
  choices = c(1,2,3,4))
```
